Vincent Jean Henri Grandjean

Bolsista de Produtividade em Pesquisa do CNPq - Nível 2

  • Endereço para acessar este CV: http://lattes.cnpq.br/2751874611495347
  • Última atualização do currículo em 25/08/2019

Possui mestrado em Algorithmic, Algebra and Geometry - Université de Rennes I (1993) e doutorado em Mathematics - Université de Rennes I (2000). Atualmente é professor adjunto da Universidade Federal do Ceará. Tem experiência na área de Matemática, com ênfase em Matemática, atuando principalmente nos seguintes temas: singular metric, desingularization, monomialization, thin-thick decompostion, geodesics, Bi-Lipschitz equivalences, gradient trajectories, oscillating and non-oscillating trajectories, Lojasiewicz inequalities, generalised critical values. (Texto informado pelo autor)

Teaching assistant here means that you are not in T.A. in the North American sence but something roughly between T.A. and Assitant Professor, a lot like a Visiting Assistant Professor but with fewer administrative responsabilities.

Outras informações
This time T.A. for teaching assitant as meant in North America.


ESeAT, ESEAT, França.
Vínculo institucional

1996 - 1997
Vínculo: military service, Enquadramento Funcional: national service as a maths teacher, Carga horária: 39, Regime: Dedicação exclusiva.
Outras informações
This is a military school to train officer to their technical speciality (here = telecom). So I was there to be a teacher and to deliver some maths courses to officers with a strong scientific background (two first years of university in maths and physics, namely "classes preparatoires") so that they can try to pass a contest allowing them to be train as proper engineers in a prestigiousd engineering school (Mines, Ponts, Centrale ...).


College Les Gayeulles, GAYEULLES, França.
Vínculo institucional

1995 - 1996
Vínculo: Civil servant, Enquadramento Funcional: secondary school trainee maths teacher, Carga horária: 39, Regime: Dedicação exclusiva.
Outras informações
I was having my trainee year as a secondary school maths teacher after having the national contest of ""Agregation"" (highest such national contest to become a teacher in secondary and higer education instution, even though in the latter case, you are not meant to have a research activity as a compulsory job duty/mission).
